dict.acceptation: （收件人的）称呼和地址；演讲，演说；谈吐；殷勤，求爱；
忙于，专注于；讲演；处理；在…写姓名地址；

sent.orig: A:All right. Which address shall I give you, my home address or hotel address here?
sent.trans: 好的，该给你哪一个地址，我家的地址还是这里的饭店地址？

sent.orig: Office address proof if office address is selected as correspondence address.
sent.trans: 如选择以公司地址为通讯地址，请附上公司地址证明。

sent.orig: On the Internet, the world address always refers to an electronic address, not a postal address.
sent.trans: 在因特网上，地址这个词总是指的是某个电子地址，并非某个邮政地址。

sent.orig: In the Address box, type a memory address or expression that evaluates to a memory address.
sent.trans: 在“地址”框中，键入内存地址或计算结果为内存地址的表达式。

sent.orig: I guess it got sent to the billing address as opposed to the shipping address.
sent.trans: 我猜是送货的家伙把投递地址和付款人地址搞混了。
